title: Salvador Dali’s Art and Sculptures on Selling Exhibition in London
text:
Some 80 artworks by Dali are being exhibited in Mayfair, London. Tucker Images

Text size

About 80 artworks by Salvador Dali, including bronze sculptures, drawings, lithographs, and gouaches, are on a selling exhibition in Mayfair, London, from Wednesday through Sept. 25.

Curated by art consultants Victoria Golembiovskaya, of House of the Nobleman, and Alon Zakaim, of Alon Zakaim Fine Art, the exhibition showcases Dali artworks sourced from private collections and galleries in London, as well as Madrid, Barcelona, and Lisbon.

"Salvator Dali is the father of surrealism in art and his legacy is as powerful as that of Picasso," Golembiovskaya said in a statement. “For this special Mayfair exhibition House of the Nobleman has brought together extremely rare Dali pieces which have not previously been exhibited in London.”
description: Some 80 artworks by the Spanish artist, including rare pieces not previously seen in the U.K., are sourced from collectors across Europe
